title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and combine with bacon.
Quickly stir in egg-cheese mixture and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and grill until cooked.
Heat butter in a pan and add tomato sauce.
Add grilled chicken pieces and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
